title: Love, love, love!!
text: I was a little skeptical at first, like most people when first trying this app. But found it to be amazing! My first order came in and I was in LOVE with the stuff. I got a few artificial plants for my kitchen, and some clothes for my young daughter, and they were both such good quality! Even my teenage daughter loves this app because all the clothes are “trendy” and cute! I have been using this app for every birthday and Christmas since then, since the prices are unbelievably cheap! Only con is that it take about 1-2.5 weeks to arrive, but for me i would say it’s worth it! Definitely 5 stars ❤️

title: Return Fee
text: There is now a return fee. Who’s idea was that? It’s exploitative. So now, if I buy more than one item that is made poorly and does not fit as described per YOUR size guide, I’m going to be punished for returning them? It’s not my fault the items were too small or don’t look like the picture. Why should I pay for wanting my money back for clothes I literally can’t wear? That doesn’t even sound legal. And the fee is $8?! What a scam. I will not be buying from Shein any more, and I have been a loyal shopper since before 2020. Not to mention the items take longer to arrive now, and the prices have gone up. What’s the benefit of shopping with Shein any more?
